thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Fran
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Fran

author: Fran
title: Fran
text:
Ordered some boys trainers for my son on a Sunday lunchtime ish.
They arrived via courier Monday. Absolutely delighted with speed of delivery. Postage was only €4 (it would cost me more than that to drive to town and pay for parking) and the trainers were only €20 too. As my son is quite hard on trainers would have no hesitation to use lifestyle again in a couple of months to get their replacements.
